channel.title: Re: login sM?

item.title: Re: login sM?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

You need to add the following instead:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourUsernameHere")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

Hopefully that works

item.description:
